definition: Yan mountain range across north Hebei
swallow (family Hirundinidae)/old variant of 宴[yan4]
variant of 燕[yan4]

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: It was formed during the Yanshan movement of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 它是在燕山地壳运动时期形成的。

sentences.english: Yanshan eight sceneries" is the general designation of eight scenic spots of Beijing."
sentences.chinese: 燕山八景是北京的八处风景名胜的统称。

sentences.english: He has got back to the swallow on that stretch of yellow land in the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他回到了燕山中的那片黄土地上。

sentences.english: Qianxi county is located in the south of Yanshan, at the foot of the Great Wall, Luan water lake.
sentences.chinese: 迁西县位于燕山南麓，长城脚下，滦水之滨。

sentences.english: Granite-porphyry stock is ore-forming parent rock.
sentences.chinese: 成矿主要与燕山期花岗斑岩体有关。

sentences.english: The commercial application of YLL-type rubber-protecting wax was examined in Beijing Tyre Factory.
sentences.chinese: 对燕山YLL型橡胶防护蜡进行了工业应用试验。

sentences.english: The Yanshan Hills provide a natural defence for Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 燕山是北京的天然屏障。

sentences.english: The Yanshanian ductile shearing resulted in further enrichment of gold and antimony.
sentences.chinese: 燕山期叠加的脆性变形使金锑矿进一步富集。

sentences.english: Magmatic activities in Yanshan Period caused thermal metamorphism of coal.
sentences.chinese: 燕山期岩浆活动使闸河矿区的煤发生岩浆热变质作用。

sentences.english: Ore-forming material came fron the depth, due to magma activity during late Yanshanian epoch.
sentences.chinese: 成矿物质来自深部，与燕山晚期岩浆活动密切相关。

sentences.english: Ms. Mingyue Dun is a visiting professor of Yanshan University.
sentences.chinese: 顿明月律师为燕山大学客座教授。

sentences.english: Miyun Reservoir, Asian biggest artificial lake, Yanshan pearl, summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 密云水库，亚洲最大的人工湖，燕山明珠，避暑胜地。

sentences.english: The rocks of the assimilation are Hercynian-Yanshan granites.
sentences.chinese: 同化混染的岩石主要是海西期或燕山期花岗岩。

sentences.english: The core collection of germplasm of Castanea mollissima BL.
sentences.chinese: 构建燕山板栗实生居群核心种质库。

sentences.english: Yanshan University inherited its academic legacy from the Harbin Institute of Technology (HIT) which was founded in 1920.
sentences.chinese: 燕山大学源于哈尔滨工业大学，始建于1920年。

sentences.english: Yanshanian strongly peraluminous intrusive rocks occur sporadically in the Hebei-Shanxi-Liaoning area.
sentences.chinese: 燕山期强过铝质侵入岩零星出露于冀晋辽地区。

definition: Taihang Mountains on the border between Hebei and Shanxi
Qinghe county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei/Qinghe district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市, Liaoning
Yin mountains in Inner Mongolia
old place name (in Yan of Warring states, in modern Beijing city)
Juyongguan, frontier fortress on Great Wall north of Beijing, in Changping district 昌平區|昌平区[Chang1 ping2 qu1]
Fangshan district of Beijing, formerly Fangshan county
Zunhua county level city in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei
Miyun town and county in Beijing
valley
Helan Mountains, lying across part of the border between Ningxia and Inner Mongolia
northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
Mt Song in Henan, central mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
Julu county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei
Shanhai Pass in Hebei, at the eastern terminus of the Ming dynasty Great Wall/Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei
west of Liaoning
Yanqing county in Beijing
